item.title: And the Chromecast Winner is ...
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: A little over a month ago I announced the Want to Win a Google ChromecastÂ contest and finally the winner has been selected. Since there was a grand total of 5 submissions, and one of them was immediately disqualified for a distinct lack of Ninja-presence, I decided to just do a random draw. The submitted photos were numbered by the order they appeared in on my post as I took this screenshot.
